memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *x, const uint16_t *y, uint16_t *z, const int T, const uint16_t len1, const uint16_t len2)
memberdef.name: setdiff_stable

detaileddescription.para: Extracts the elements in x that are smaller than T or are in y. Returns the length of the output vector z.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t K, const uint16_t E, const uint8_t nMax)
memberdef.name: set_code_params

detaileddescription.para: Gets the codeword length N, nPC and nWmPC depending on the code parameters. Returns -1 if not supported configuration, otherwise returns 0.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t K, uint16_t E, uint8_t nMax, polar_code_ibil ibil) override
memberdef.name: set

briefdescription.para: Initializes the different index sets as needed by the subchannel allocation block and/or by the polar decoder.

parameterdescription.para: Number of bits of the codeword after rate matching.
Maximum $log_2(N)$, where $N$ is the codeword size, nMax = 9 for downlink and nMax = 10, for uplink.

simplesect.para: An integer: 0 if the function executes correctly, -1 otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Indicator of bit interleaver (set to not_present to disable).
